thread.section_title: The Chesterfield Mayfair - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Weekend away
thread.title_full: Weekend away - Review of The Chesterfield Mayfair, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: 20pauline13
title: Weekend away
text: We stayed here in January from Friday to Sunday. From the time we arrived until the time we checked out the staff couldn't do enough for us, everyone was so helpful and friendly... on the Friday night we booked a pre-theatre meal. It was delicious, accompanied with a great bottle of wine from their cellars... Their breakfast was very plentiful, everything you could possibly want was cartered for, all served on China plates. Definitely would return to this lovely old hotel
